issue.title: Empty message types caused by `Entity::Fini()` calling `Node::Fini()`

message.html:
Thanks for the report. I assume this is the change you are proposing?

diff -r 574b668cfac0 gazebo/physics/Entity.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc  Fri Oct 16 12:54:21 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc  Fri Oct 16 16:47:22 2015 -0700
@@ -595,7 +595,6 @@
   Base::Fini();

   this->connections.clear();
-  this->node->Fini();
 }

 //////////////////////////////////////////////////
